Auto-generate daily/weekly chronicles from session data and git commits.

## Blocked by
- Git layer (source of commit data)
- AI handoff tested (ensures session data flows properly)

## This unlocks
- Moon phase chronicles
- Quarterly reviews

Set up git version control for the Living Codex vault to enable chronicle automation and history tracking.

- [ ] Configure .gitignore for Obsidian

tasks.filename: Set up TaskNotes integration with Claude
tasks.content:
Validate that Claude can create tasks via file operations and TaskNotes indexes them properly.

## Success Criteria
- [x] Task appears in TaskNotes views
- [x] Calendar shows it scheduled for today
- [x] Can update status from Claude

tasks.filename: Test handoff with Gemini or GPT
tasks.content:
Validate that the Protocol/Briefing/Handoff system works with non-Claude AIs.

**From quest:** Establish-Living-Codex

Validate the Protocol/Briefing/Handoff system by testing with Gemini or GPT.

## Blocked by
- Git layer must be configured first (for proper handoff state)

## Success Criteria
- [ ] Another AI can read the handoff
- [ ] Context transfers accurately
- [ ] No critical information lost
Quick test to understand how TaskNotes works.
